description: A good meal is a meal that contains exactly two different food items with a sum of deliciousness equal to a power of two. You can pick any two different foods to make a good meal. Given an array of integers deliciousness where deliciousness[i] is the deliciousness of the i​​​​​​th​​​​​​​​ item of food, return the number of different good meals you can make from this list modulo 109 + 7. Note that items with different indices are considered different even if they have the same deliciousness value.
